name: Pixel Bar GIAG (Give It A Go)
location: Pixel Bar, LS1 3AL
description: Try out one of our most popular events for free and meet some of your fellow students! You could get competitive in the Mario Kart tournament (with prizes!), make new friends working together in a co-op game, or just relax and enjoy the fun themed range of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at Pixel Bar.

name: Capture The Flag GIAG (Give It A Go)
location: Sir William Henry Bragg Building, LS2 9JT
description: Get an exciting taster of CompSoc's academic offering by racing against other teams in a competition to solve cyber security puzzles before everyone else. It's free with snacks provided, and there will be a range of challenges to solve for all experience levels.

name: Welcome and Intro Social
location: Pyramid Canteen, LUU, LS2 9JZ
description: Come along to our very first event of the year to meet the committee and find out what you can expect from CompSoc this year. It's the best opportunity to meet other prospective members, we've got some fun activities planned and the bar will be open for drinks.

name: Pixel Bar Social Night
location: Pixel Bar, 25 Great George St, Leeds LS1 3AL
description: Our first Give it a Go at Pixel Bar was a brilliant opportunity to meet other members and play some games. If you missed it, don't worry - there are plenty of Pixel Bar socials throughout the year.

name: Capture the Flag
location: Helix@UoL, EC Stoner, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 3AR
description: Our second Give it a Go saw participants test their cybersecurity and problem-solving skills in a competitive puzzle competition finding secret codes in files and websites, with prizes for the winning team.

name: Charity Casino Night
location: LUU Function Room, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JZ
description: An action-packed night of casino-themed games (without the risk) that raised £376 for Computer Aid International and was praised by attendees as the best social yet!

name: Fridge-to-Fridge
location: Various locations in Hyde Park, Leeds
description: A four-part night with different themed alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at each location, it was a huge success and a great opportunity to make new friends.

name: Charity Summer Ball
location: Queens Hotel, New Station Street, Leeds LS1 1PJ
description: Our final and biggest event of the year, the black-tie Summer Ball had 280 attendees who were served a three-course meal with drinks, a DJ, and awards to make it a memorable night.

name: Pub Quiz
location: LUU Function Room, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JZ
description: A unique computer science twist on a pub quiz, including a hygiene round which was surprisingly well answered, interactive challenges, and themed prizes.

name: Mario Kart Tournament
location: Pixel Bar, 25 Great George St, Leeds LS1 3AL
description: Our first games tournament was a huge success with closely fought battles and a nail-biting final on the big screen, hosted at Pixel Bar who provided equiment and themed drinks.

name: Smash Bros Ultimate Tournament
location: Pixel Bar, 25 Great George St, Leeds LS1 3AL
description: We built on the success of our first tournament by introducing casual and competitive brackets to get more people involved, and once again Louis and Pixel Bar hosted a flawless event.

name: LeedsHack 2025
location: Sir William Henry Bragg, University of Leeds, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JT
description: Our first hackathon was a huge success - 24 hours of coding, workshops, and networking with industry professionals, with prizes for the best projects and a chance to showcase skills and learn new ones.

name: Rewriting the Code Workshop
location: GR.25, Sir William Henry Bragg Building, University of Leeds, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JT
description: We're excited to announce our partnership with Rewriting the Code, and our first workshop covered networking, assessments, and interviews, fostering a sense of community for our female and non-binary members.

name: Halloween Fridge-to-Fridge
location: Various locations in Hyde Park, Leeds
description: The return of our fridge-to-fridge with a Halloween twist was another success, and there were some brilliant costumes on display! There's no better way to celebrate spooky season than with your friends and a fridge-to-fridge.

name: Mario Kart Tournament
location: Pixel Bar, 25 Great George St, Leeds LS1 3AL
description: Our regular Pixel Bar tournament made a return for this semester, with another closely fought Mario Kart battle, plenty of other games and delicious drinks. Whether you're a Mario Kart pro or coming along to socialise and play casually, everyone is welcome.

name: Personal Branding Workshop
location: Esther Simpson Building, Lyddon Terrace, Leeds LS2 9LA
description: A workshop run by Virgin Media O2 aimed at women in tech, this was a great opportunity to learn about personal branding and career skills from experts in a leading tech company. We're passionate about supporting our members to overcome barriers.

name: Arcade Club
location: Arcade Club, Abbey Retail Park, Savins Mill Way, Kirkstall, Leeds LS5 3RP
description: A night at Europe's largest free play video arcade was a social not to be missed. With over 300 machines as well as modern consoles, it was a brilliant way to socialise and try something new... or not, if you're already a retro games fan!

name: Fridge-to-Fridge
location: Various locations in Hyde Park, Leeds
description: Another fun instalment of our fridge-to-fridge tradition saw attendees dress as their type! As always, there were plenty of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at each house and it was a great social opportunity to meet new people.

name: Pub Quiz
location: LUU Function Room, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JZ
description: Our second pub quiz was as successful as the first, with fun round themes such as Geoguessr, music, logos, and the famous minigames. It was a closely fought competition with the winning team taking home £50 in Nando's vouchers.

name: Bragging Rights 1.0 - Paintball
location: Skirmish Paintball, Bramham Park Estate, South York Road, Leeds LS24 9NR
description: Our first collaboration with Physics saw the societies going head-to-head in a paintball competition, with Computer Science being crowned the best in the building and be awarded official Bragging Rights!

name: AGM (Annual General Meeting)
location: GR.25, Sir William Henry Bragg Building, University of Leeds, Woodhouse, Leeds LS2 9JT
description: Our in-person AGM was open to all members and giving them a chance to have their say on the direction of the society, and hear from and ask questions of the candidates running in this year's elections. It was great to see so many people there!

name: Summer Ball
location: Royal Armouries, Armouries Drive, Leeds LS10 1LT
description: Our summer ball is returning bigger and better! With a starry night theme and black tie dress code, a Â£20 ticket will get you a welcome drink, 3-course meal, and half a bottle of wine. Bring friends and celebrate the end of the year in style! Tickets are on Engage now.
